msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
TextView (and therefore FxTextArea) now supports line-by-line, instead of pixel-by-pixel, vertical scrolling, by using the scrollLines() method in TLF.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Implement paste operation which enforces restrict, maxChars and displayAsPassword for TextView, FxTextInput and FxTextArea.
Doc Notes: ctrl-c/ctrl-v/ctrl-z work as expected, at least on Windows
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

16871 - Setting lineBreak style on FxTextArea had no effect.  In partAdded(), for textView, the lineBreak style was explicitly set to "toFit".  This overrides the inherited value from FxTextArea so any future changes to FxTextArea's lineBreak are not inherited by textView.  Also if the FxTextArea was created with lineBreak="explicit" it was overridden by partAdded().
18607 - RTE when declaring a TextView object with no text/content defined.  Since there is no text there isn't a flowComposer.  The fix is to not attempt to compose the text if there isn't any.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
If no selection, insertText() does an append.  Previously it did nothing.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
18602 – in TextView focusInHandler and focusOutHandler make sure there is a selection before calling showSelection()/hideSelection()
